name: Ancient Amethyst Dragon
movement: walk 40 ft., burrow 40 ft., fly 60 ft.
description: The Ancient Amethyst Dragon embodies the power and majesty of dragons, showcasing a formidable presence with psionic abilities that manipulate the minds of its foes. It is characterized by its dark, scaled body and regal demeanor, exuding both power and intelligence.
memorable: This dragon stands out with its potent psionic abilities, allowing it to observe and manipulate creatures from great distances, making it a complex adversary.
goals: The dragon seeks to dominate lesser beings, gain knowledge, and assert its will through manipulation and power.
relations: Other dragons may view it as a powerful ally or foe, and it may command lesser creatures or psychic entities.
environment: Typically found in lairs that are secluded and secure, often within mountain ranges or ancient ruins.
strengths: Resistances to force and psychic damage, immunity to fatigue, and high saving throw bonuses reflect its resilience.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to opponents immune or particularly resistant to psychic effects.
attacks: Employs a bite that deals piercing and force damage, claws that inflict slashing damage, and a powerful Psionic Wave attack causing psychic damage.
most_powerful_ability: Concussive Breath, a 90-foot cone of telekinetic energy causing devastating force damage to multiple targets.
senses: Possesses darkvision that extends 120 feet and a passive perception of 20.
skills: Notable for high skill proficiencies in deception, persuasion, and insight, facilitating manipulation in encounters.
additional_information: Legendary Resistance allows it to ensure survival against magical effects.
Far Thoughts enables it to see and hear any psionic creature within 100 miles.
Innate Spellcasting grants access to powerful spells without components.
Can charm enemies as a legendary action for battlefield control.
Assume Control enables manipulation of charmed creatures to act in its favor.
spellcasting: Innate spellcasting with the ability to cast calming and controlling spells like calm emotions, charm person, and modify memory.
